A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Broke all the Lore\, and every rule of starwars. Characters completely used as character development props\, cringey and awkward acting by the new girl (fins love interest\, she was so unimpressionable I couldn't remember her name) and others\, and loose ends everywhere\, even for a second installment of a three part series. It had so much potential\, and threw all of it away. Only a miracle can help Abrams recover this dumpster fire in the finale.
